epic.title: User Authentication & Authorization
epic.summary: Comprehensive identity management and role-based access control system ensuring secure access to healthcare data and applications.
epic.businessOverview: Comprehensive identity management and role-based access control system ensuring secure access to healthcare data and applications. The system provides multi-factor authentication, single sign-on capabilities, and granular role-based permissions to protect patient information and ensure compliance with HIPAA and other regulatory requirements.
epic.technicalArchitecture:
## Technical Architecture Components

- Identity Provider (IdP) integration
- SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0 protocol support
- Multi-factor authentication service
- Role-based access control (RBAC) engine
- Session management service
- Audit logging and monitoring system
epic.implementationTimeline:
## Implementation Timeline

**Week 1:**
- Identity provider setup and configuration

**Week 2:**
- SSO integration and testing

**Week 3:**
- Role-based access control implementation

**Week 4:**
- Security testing and compliance validation
epic.caseStudyReference:
## Case Study Reference

**Multi-Specialty Healthcare Group**

- **Challenge:** Managing access across 500+ users with varying roles and permissions
- **Outcome:** Centralized authentication, 99.9% uptime, zero security incidents

stories.title: Multi-factor authentication (MFA) required
stories.description: Require multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all user logins to enhance security and protect against unauthorized access to patient data and systems.

stories.title: Single Sign-On (SSO) support (SAML 2.0, OAuth 2.0)
stories.description: Support Single Sign-On (SSO) using SAML 2.0 and OAuth 2.0 protocols to enable seamless authentication across multiple applications and reduce password fatigue.

stories.title: Password complexity enforcement
stories.description: Enforce password complexity requirements including minimum length, character variety, and complexity rules to ensure strong password security.

stories.title: Account lockout after 5 failed attempts
stories.description: Automatically lock user accounts after 5 failed login attempts to prevent brute force attacks and unauthorized access attempts.

stories.title: Password reset via email/SMS
stories.description: Enable password reset functionality via email or SMS to allow users to securely recover access to their accounts when passwords are forgotten.

stories.title: Session management with configurable timeout
stories.description: Implement session management with configurable timeout settings to balance security and user convenience, automatically logging out inactive sessions.

stories.title: Pre-defined roles (Admin, Provider, Nurse, Front Desk, Billing)
stories.description: Provide pre-defined roles including Admin, Provider, Nurse, Front Desk, and Billing with appropriate permissions for each role to streamline access management.

stories.title: Custom role creation with granular permissions
stories.description: Enable creation of custom roles with granular permission settings to accommodate unique organizational needs and access requirements.

stories.title: Data access controls (patient, location, department)
stories.description: Implement data access controls based on patient, location, and department to ensure users only access data relevant to their role and responsibilities.

stories.title: Audit logging of privilege escalation
stories.description: Maintain comprehensive audit logging of all privilege escalation events to track when users gain elevated access and support security monitoring.

stories.title: Emergency "break-the-glass" access with justification
stories.description: Provide emergency "break-the-glass" access functionality requiring justification to allow authorized users to access restricted data in emergency situations while maintaining audit trail.
